Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Progress: The lift appears to be ^locked^. Perhaps if you find a $key$ you can use it at the =mines entrance=...
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Special/:
Be careful, hero...
     A powerful ^dread beast^ haunts this floor...
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Floor En: =Gloom=: A mysterious purple haze is =empowering the monsters=.
=HP Penalty=: An ancient magic =siphons some of your life=.
=Exhaustion=: An ancient magic =saps some of your energy=.
=Item Penalty=: Your items have turned to =worthless stone=.
=Damage Down=: Fear grips you, =reducing your strength=.
$Fey$: The $blessings of the fey$ empower you.
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/offering:
You hear #whispers# from an unknown entity...
     $Ritual$...
          ^Offering^...
Make an ^offering^ of =HEALTH= to complete the $ritual$?
Make an ^offering^ of =STAMINA= to complete the $ritual$?
Make an ^offering^ of =MANA= to complete the $ritual$?

The $ritual$ is complete, mortal...
     #Your HEALTH feeds my flesh...#

The $ritual$ is complete, mortal...
     #Your STAMINA feeds my spirit...#

The $ritual$ is complete, mortal...
     #Your MANA feeds my mind...#

Hero...
     do not succumb...
          to the ^temptation^...
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/rage/desc: Unleash your fury, causing all attacks to do guaranteed critical lethal damage.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/protectio: The priestess protects you, providing a magical barrier that absorbs the next 2 hits.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/serenity/: Meditate, warding off all unnatural afflictions. All floor enchantments are dispelled.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/safety/de: Focus, observing your surroundings. All floor traps are disabled.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/silence/d: You hear nothing but silence. The next dungeon floor will have less monsters.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/fortune/d: Fortune favors the bold. Traverse the ladder to the next dungeon floor.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/redemptio: The priestess blesses you, providing you with a second chance at life.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/alteratio: The future is unpredictable. Some monsters may be altered on the next dungeon floor.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/concealme: Your body becomes ethereal, allowing you to remain undetected by monsters.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/temptatio: Give in, and listen to the faint whispers that call out to you.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Salves/sustainin: Restores health and stamina slowly over time for 1 hour.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Keys/tide_cavern: A single use key that temporarily unlocks Floor 20 on the lift in the mines entrance.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Keys/deep_earth_: A single use key that temporarily unlocks Floor 40 on the lift in the mines entrance.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Keys/lava_caves_: A single use key that temporarily unlocks Floor 60 on the lift in the mines entrance.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Keys/ruins_key/d: A single use key that temporarily unlocks Floor 80 on the lift in the mines entrance.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Beast Coins/gian: A beast coin found in the ruins biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Beast Coins/larg: A beast coin found in the lava caves biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Beast Coins/medi: A beast coin found in the deep earth biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Beast Coins/smal: A beast coin found in the tide caverns biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Beast Coins/tiny: A beast coin found in the upper mines biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Glow Stones/gian: A glow stone found in the ruins biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Glow Stones/larg: A glow stone found in the lava caves biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Glow Stones/medi: A glow stone found in the deep earth biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Glow Stones/smal: A glow stone found in the tide caverns biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Glow Stones/tiny: A glow stone found in the upper mines biome of the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Soul Stones/cler: A strange egg shaped stone with an engraving on it that glows faintly.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Swords/mistpool/: A sword that seems to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/mistpool_h: A helmet that seems to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/mistpool_c: Armor that seems to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/mistpool_p: Legplates that seem to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/mistpool_b: Greaves that seem to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/mistpool_r: A ring that seem to glow brighter the deeper you traverse inside the dungeon.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_hel: A helmet radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_che: Armor radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_pan: Legplates radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_boo: Greaves radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_glo: Gauntlets radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cursed_bra: A bracelet radiating dark energy. Definitely cursed and unsafe to wear!
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_hel: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_che: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_pan: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_boo: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_glo: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Items/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Armor/cleric_bra: A legendary piece of equipment that once belonged to a Cleric.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/co: The hidden floor rune activates, confusing your movement!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/di: The hidden floor rune activates, disorienting your perception!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/ex: The hidden floor trap explodes, damaging you and all nearby monsters!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/in: The hidden floor rune activates, inhibiting your attacks!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Traps/lu: The hidden floor rune activates, summoning monsters nearby!
Conversations/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Offering: =Dread=: A =powerful monster= awaits you on the next floor.
=Peril=: A =perilous situation= awaits you on the next floor.
=Reckoning=: The =end is nigh= on the next floor.
$Leech$: Your attacks will $heal you$ a tiny amount on the next floor.
$Inner Fire$: Summon $flames of destruction$ on the next floor.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/0/text: This mod makes significant changes to the dungeon and overall gameplay experience inside of it.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/1/text: All combat and mining perks are disabled. Items not specific to the Deep Dungeon are prohibited.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/2/text: Each floor has chance to be imbued with up to three random enchantments.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/3/text: Sigils may be obtained when opening treasure chests and offer incredibly powerful beneficial effects.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/4/text: Salves are the only healing items allowed in the Deep Dungeon. You may purchase them at the Clinic.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/5/text: Floor Traps are hidden tiles on the floor of the dungeon infused with various detrimental effects.
Tutorials/Mods/Deep Dungeon/steps/6/text: Offerings are a special event that may randomly occur when descending floors and affect the next floor.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/salve_li: You have already used that type of salve on the current floor!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_pen: You are unable to use that item due to the Item Penalty floor enchantment!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_pro: That item is prohibited in the Deep Dungeon!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/item_res: You may only use Deep Dungeon specific items inside the dungeon!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/inhibite: You are unable to use the Mistpool Sword due to the Inhibiting Trap's effect!
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/Sigils/c: Your concealment fades! Monsters will now detect you.
Notifications/Mods/Deep Dungeon/lift_key: You are only allowed to use a lift key at the mines entrance!
